title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are misleading because they are enabled but do not have any effect. This behavior is observed when opening a small image, such as an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the image.
EB: The scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example for small images, as they are currently misleading and do not provide any functionality.
SR:
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Open a small image, such as an icon.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled but do not affect the image.
